SELECT tj.empName,tj.empId,tj.orgId,tj.cno, GROUP_CONCAT(timeLen ORDER BY timeLen) AS timeLen, GROUP_CONCAT(callOutCount ORDER BY timeLen) callOutCount, GROUP_CONCAT(callOutConnectCount ORDER BY timeLen) AS callOutConnectCount FROM ( SELECT emp_name AS empName, emp_id AS empId, org_id AS orgId, `timeLen`, cno, SUM(phoneCountTotal) AS callOutCount, #致电次数 SUM(connectCountTotal) AS callOutConnectCount#致电接通次数 FROM `timelen_out_statistics` WHERE 1=1
and (DATE_FORMAT(createTime,'%Y-%m-%d') between #{params.normalDate} and #{params.normalDate1})
GROUP BY `timeLen`, cno ) AS tj WHERE 1=1
and orgId IN ( SELECT id FROM sys_organization WHERE path LIKE CONCAT(( SELECT path FROM sys_organization WHERE id = #{params.orgId} ), '%') )
GROUP BY tj.cno
order by ${sort} ${order}
ORDER BY CONVERT(tj.empName USING gbk) DESC, timeLen ASC
